conbody.p: This document introduces you to the 3GP Library Component.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The 3GP Library Component provides support for the reading (parsing) and writing (composing) of various multimedia container formats. You can use the 3GP Library Component to parse and compose the following file types:

section.title: Architectural relationships
section.p: The 3GP Library Component is a standalone component in the Multimedia Plug-ins collection. The following diagram shows the architecture of the 3GP Library Component:

section.title: Library summary
section.p: The 3GP Library Component consists of the following libraries:

entry.p: The Symbian C++ wrapper classes for parsing and composing 3GP, 3G2, and MP4 files. For more information, see 3GP Library Overview.

section.title: Typical uses
section.p: The 3GP Library Component lets you compose and parse 3GP, 3G2, and MP4 files.
